pages.title: Elemental Runes
pages.text: Now that you were able to provide some Blank Runes we can begin. For real this time. All you have to do is combine a Mana Gem and a blank rune. Simple, right? You'll need a lot of those in the future, so keep your Ash wood around. In the next pages I'll put the recipe of all the Elemental Runes. I want you to craft at least one of each.
